start.text:
You wake up. 3:19AM.

Your apartment is dark, but the television is on.

You don’t own a TV.
start.reminder: A faint blue glow pulses from the corner. Something glints on the table.
start.flavor: You feel watched… like something remembered you before you woke up.

sceneLook.text:
Empty cereal boxes. A shoebox of childhood junk. A decoder ring rests atop it—still shining.

The static on the TV seems to react when you stare too long.
sceneLook.reminder: The decoder ring pulses with a warmth you didn’t notice before.
sceneLook.flavor: You remember this place. You just don’t remember how long it’s remembered you.

sceneDecoderUnlock.text:
You grip the decoder ring. It vibrates in your hand. You press it against a cereal box.

The box clicks. Opens. Inside is a VHS tape. No label. No logo.
sceneDecoderUnlock.flavor: The room feels colder. The static says your name.

sceneTape.text:
You insert the tape. It starts immediately.

A voiceover: *"We were never off air…"*

A cartoon mascot stares at the camera. "Let’s try that again!"
sceneTape.flavor: You’ve seen this episode before. But not from this side of the screen.

sceneFakeEnd.text:
You take a breath.

The static is gone. The screen is dark. You’re safe.

You’re awake.
sceneFakeEnd.flavor: You can almost hear birds. Morning air. You haven’t felt that in years.

sceneTwist.text:
You stand.

But your body stays still.

The TV flickers back on. It shows your room. The same toys. The same glow.

But that isn’t your face in the reflection.
sceneTwist.flavor: Something wears your memory like a mask.

sceneDecayTrigger1.text:
The lights blink. The static hums louder.

A voice rasps: *You're not supposed to be here yet...*
sceneDecayTrigger1.flavor: Your chest tightens. Like something inside the tape is watching back.
